abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of Excluded is allowed.

decrease_speed_fans.description: Decreases the speed of all fans except for the selected targets. WARNING: this will include fans added later to Home Assistant.

percentage_step.description: Percentage step by which the speed should be decreased.
percentage_step.name: Decrement

decrease_speed_fans.name: Decrease speed for all fans

increase_speed_fans.description: Increases the speed of all fans except for the selected targets. WARNING: this will include fans added later to Home Assistant.

percentage_step.description: Percentage step by which the speed should be increased.
percentage_step.name: Increment

increase_speed_fans.name: Increase speed for all fans

oscillate_fans.description: Controls the oscillation of all fans except for the selected targets. WARNING: this will include fans added later to Home Assistant.
oscillate_fans.name: Oscillate all fans

set_direction_fans.description: Sets all fan rotation direction except for the selected targets. WARNING: this will include fans added later to Home Assistant.
set_direction_fans.name: Set direction for all fans

set_percentage_fans.description: Sets the speed of all fans except for the selected targets. WARNING: this will include fans added later to Home Assistant.
set_percentage_fans.name: Set speed for all fans

set_preset_mode_fans.description: Sets preset fan mode for all fans except for the selected targets. WARNING: this will include fans added later to Home Assistant.
set_preset_mode_fans.name: Set preset mode for all fans

toggle_fans.description: Toggles all fans on/off except for the selected targets. WARNING: this will include fans added later to Home Assistant.
toggle_fans.name: Toggle all fans

turn_off_fans.description: Turns all fans on except for the selected targets. WARNING: this will include fans added later to Home Assistant.
turn_off_fans.name: Turn off all fans

turn_on_fans.description: Turns all fans on except for the selected targets. WARNING: this will include fans added later to Home Assistant.

preset_mode.description: Preset fan mode except for the selected targets. WARNING: this will include fans added later to Home Assistant.
preset_mode.name: Preset mode

turn_on_fans.name: Turn on all fans

toggle_lights.description: Toggles all lights except for the selected targets, from on to off, or, off to on, based on their current state. WARNING: this will include lights added later to Home Assistant.

brightness.description: Number indicating brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness, and 255 is the maximum brightness.
brightness.name: Brightness value

brightness_pct.description: Number indicating the percentage of full brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness, and 100 is the maximum brightness.
brightness_pct.name: Brightness

flash.description: Tell light to flash, can be either value short or long.
flash.name: Flash

hs_color.description: Color in hue/sat format. A list of two integers. Hue is 0-360 and Sat is 0-100.
hs_color.name: Hue/Sat color

profile.description: Name of a light profile to use.
profile.name: Profile

rgb_color.description: The color in RGB format. A list of three integers between 0 and 255 representing the values of red, green, and blue.
rgb_color.name: Color

rgbw_color.description: The color in RGBW format. A list of four integers between 0 and 255 representing the values of red, green, blue, and white.
rgbw_color.name: RGBW-color

rgbww_color.description: The color in RGBWW format. A list of five integers between 0 and 255 representing the values of red, green, blue, cold white, and warm white.
rgbww_color.name: RGBWW-color

transition.description: Duration it takes to get to next state.
transition.name: Transition

white.description: Set the light to white mode.
white.name: White

xy_color.description: Color in XY-format. A list of two decimal numbers between 0 and 1.
xy_color.name: XY-color

toggle_lights.name: Toggle All Lights

turn_off_lights.description: Turn off all lights except for the selected targets. WARNING: this will include lights added later to Home Assistant.

flash.description: Tell light to flash, can be either value short or long.
flash.name: Flash

transition.description: Duration it takes to get to next state.
transition.name: Transition

turn_off_lights.name: Turn off All Lights

turn_on_lights.description: Turns on all lights except for the selected targets and adjust properties of the light, even when they are turned on already. WARNING: this will include lights added later to Home Assistant.

brightness.description: Number indicating brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness, and 255 is the maximum brightness.
brightness.name: Brightness value

brightness_pct.description: Number indicating the percentage of full brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness, and 100 is the maximum brightness.
brightness_pct.name: Brightness

flash.description: Tell light to flash, can be either value short or long.
flash.name: Flash

hs_color.description: Color in hue/sat format. A list of two integers. Hue is 0-360 and Sat is 0-100.
hs_color.name: Hue/Sat color

profile.description: Name of a light profile to use.
profile.name: Profile

rgb_color.description: The color in RGB format. A list of three integers between 0 and 255 representing the values of red, green, and blue.
rgb_color.name: Color

rgbw_color.description: The color in RGBW format. A list of four integers between 0 and 255 representing the values of red, green, blue, and white.
rgbw_color.name: RGBW-color

rgbww_color.description: The color in RGBWW format. A list of five integers between 0 and 255 representing the values of red, green, blue, cold white, and warm white.
rgbww_color.name: RGBWW-color

transition.description: Duration it takes to get to next state.
transition.name: Transition

white.description: Set the light to white mode.
white.name: White

xy_color.description: Color in XY-format. A list of two decimal numbers between 0 and 1.
xy_color.name: XY-color

turn_on_lights.name: Turn On All Lights
